column3: Concept ACK, but please improve your commit message from just "Updated config file".\n

Thanks, but now it's too long long, please stick to the "consisting of a short subject line (50 chars max), a blank line and explanatory text as separate paragraph(s)" format.\n\nPlease read https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md especially "Contributor Workflow" and "Squashing Commits".
Thanks for the guidance, and apologies for the multi commit message updates, had some local config issues. Seems fine now with the updated log messages as per the documentation guidelines provided.
Squashed the unnecessary noise and consolidated into a single commit with updated comment as per the guidelines
